jaca.android.dev
Class LocationManagerArtifact

java.lang.Object
  cartago.Artifact
      jaca.android.dev.JaCaArtifact
          jaca.android.dev.LocationManagerArtifact
Direct Known Subclasses:
GPSManager
public abstract class LocationManagerArtifact
extends JaCaArtifact

This class provides access to the system location services. Developers can extend this class to define an artifact usable from agents for obtain periodic updates of the device's geographical location.

Author:
mguidi

 void startMonitoring()
          Artifact operation used for starting retrieving location updates from the LocationManager
